text.section:
The Mayor and City Council of Baltimore City or the governing body of a county or of a municipal corporation may grant, by law, a tax credit against the county or municipal corporation property tax imposed on real property on which erosion control structures or devices have been installed or for which erosion control procedures have been implemented that halt or retard erosion of shorelines and deposit of eroded sediments in the waters of the State, including:
erection or placement of bulkheads, groins, or other erosion control devices;
measures required to stabilize waterside, shorelines, and banks; and
measures required to change drainage patterns.
